nodes.documentation:
@notice After the partition challenge has lead to a divergence in the hash
 within one time step, anyone can start a mechine run challenge to decide
 whether the claimer was correct about that particular step transition.
 This function call solely instantiate a memory manager, so the
 provider must fill the appropriate addresses that will be read by the
 machine.
nodes.name: startMachineRunChallenge

nodes.documentation:
@notice After having filled the memory manager with the necessary data,
 the provider calls this function to instantiate the machine and perform
 one step on it. The machine will write to memory now. Later, the
 provider will be expected to update the memory hash accordingly.
nodes.name: settleVerificationGame

nodes.name: getMaxInstanceDuration

params._maxCycle: is the maximum amount of steps a machine can perform

params._finalTime: max cycle of the machine for that computation
params._initialHash: hash in which both claimer and challenger agree on
params._machineAddress: address of the machine that will run the instruction

claimVictoryByTime(uint256).notice: Claimer can claim victory if challenger has lost the deadline for some of the steps in the protocol.

settleVerificationGame(uint256).notice: After having filled the memory manager with the necessary data, the provider calls this function to instantiate the machine and perform one step on it. The machine will write to memory now. Later, the provider will be expected to update the memory hash accordingly.

startMachineRunChallenge(uint256).notice: After the partition challenge has lead to a divergence in the hash within one time step, anyone can start a mechine run challenge to decide whether the claimer was correct about that particular step transition. This function call solely instantiate a memory manager, so the provider must fill the appropriate addresses that will be read by the machine.

winByPartitionTimeout(uint256).notice: In case one of the parties wins the partition challenge by timeout, then he or she can call this function to claim victory in the hireCPU contract as well.
